name: Parallels (itch) (julpop) (julpop)
description: The year is 2050. Your sister Jasmine calls you on your holographic phone and tells you that she made a breakthrough in her secretive research, which she hasn't shared much about with you before. She sounds rushed and breaks off, but not before agreeing to meet. However, when you get to her house, it appears that nobody is there. Where is your sister and what research was she working on?
